question_text: Which scenario could result in traffic looping indefinitely without a proper gateway configuration?
answer_options: Static IP and gateway are on different VLANs
Default gateway IP matches the device’s own IP
Two devices share the same MAC address
correct_answer: Default gateway IP matches the device’s own IP
explanation: If the default gateway is set to the same IP as the device, the system may attempt to forward external traffic to itself repeatedly.
